title: Two 2-minute Rules to Beat Procrastination (in 2 minutes)

data.0:00: after reading tons of productivity books
data.0:01: i came across so many rules like the
data.0:04: two-year rule the five-minute rule the
data.0:06: five-second rule no not that five-second
data.0:09: rule the problem is that these rules are
data.0:10: meant for companies or entrepreneurs but
data.0:13: i was able to adapt into my studies
data.0:15: during med school and drastically cut
data.0:17: down in my procrastination so i'm going
data.0:18: to share with you two different
data.0:20: two-minute rules for the next two
data.0:22: minutes the first two minute rule comes
data.0:24: from getting things done by david allen
data.0:26: he says if it takes two minutes to do
data.0:28: get it done right now for example if i
data.0:30: need to take out the trash today it
data.0:32: takes two minutes to do so if i'm
data.0:34: thinking about it now might as well just
data.0:36: do it now instead of writing it down on
data.0:38: a to-do list or probably forgetting
data.0:40: about it or having to come back to it
data.0:41: later which takes more than two minutes
data.0:44: that's how i see it so here's a list of
data.0:46: things that might take two minutes
data.0:47: throughout the day like organizing your
data.0:49: desk or watering your plants or clipping
data.0:52: those nasty nails i just do it when i
data.0:54: notice it but these little things start
data.0:55: to add up so this rule biases my brain
data.0:57: towards taking action and away from
data.1:01: rule comes from atomic habits by james
data.1:03: clear he says when you're trying to do
data.1:05: something you don't really want to do
data.1:07: simplify the task down to two minutes or
data.1:09: less so doing your entire reading
data.1:17: 10 flash cards now some of you might
data.1:19: think yeah this is just a jedi mind
data.1:22: trick like why would i fall for it how
data.1:24: is this at all sustainable and to that
data.1:26: he says when you're starting out limit
data.1:28: yourself to only two minutes so back in
data.1:31: med school i wanted to build a habit of
data.1:33: studying for one hour every day before
data.1:35: dinner so i tried this trick but i
data.1:38: limited myself to just two minutes i'd
data.1:41: sit down open my laptop study for two
data.1:43: minutes and then close my laptop and
data.1:45: went to do something else it seems
data.1:47: unproductive at first right it seems
data.1:48: stupid but staying consistent with this
data.1:51: two minute routine day after day meant
data.1:53: that i was becoming the type of person
data.1:56: who studies daily i was mastering the
data.1:58: habit of just showing up because a habit
data.2:01: needs to be established before it can be
